title: Crash on load screen new monitor/tv
body:
I keep on crashing on load screen with league I am using a new monitor/tv has a much higher resolution.
also how should i put logs on here?

replies.body:
There's been a trend of crashing issues with TV displays and certain display resolutions that League doesn't support. I recommend [lowering your resolution](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html) to something like 1920x1080 to see if this resolves the issue.

Let me know the results of that change.
